articles.title: Blue Jays’ Schneider explains decision to intentionally walk Judge in 10th inning - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: New York Yankees slugger Aaron Judge was denied an opportunity to tie Roger Marris's American League record of 61 home runs during the top of the 10th inning of Monday's game against the Toronto Blue Jays.

articles.title: The 2022 Forbes 400 List Of Richest Americans: Facts And Figures - Forbes
articles.description: For the first time since the Great Recession, the superrich did not get richer this year.
articles.content:

fter a roaring 2021, the 400 richest people in the U.S.along with many Americanshave been hit by rising inflation and falling markets. As a group, this years Forbes 400 is $500 billion poorer than… [+3946 chars]
